item.description:
Quick-playing but detailed simulations of college basketball. Instant download, print and play game.

Features Easy to set up & play: Just shuffle the action cards and play. (If you want to keep score, enter the player and team names onto the provided score sheet

All play derived from 100 "action cards": Each card is 2-sided. 3 trips through one side of the cards equals one half of play. This length of playing time varies according to each team's pace rating.

Statistically accurate: Every college team from the 2005-2006 season, along with the players, are rated in every possible statistical category.

ALL college teams represented: Now you can simulate games between Division 1, 2, and 3 teams.

Each team and player rated in several categories: Every statistic you would expect to be covered is here. 2 and 3 point shooting, free throw shooting, rebounding (offensive and defensive), assists, steals, blocks, turnovers, and fouls.

Keep score as you play and compile stats

Even play games between divisions: Match up a division I team against a division II team with simple formulas.

Optional injury system

Exclusive "pace" ratings: One problem I've found with other basketball sims is the lack of realistic scores. Some teams regularly score 100+ points a game, others barely break 60. With the pace system, you will see the scores of your games closely reflect the team's actual output.

Realistic foul system: Another shortcoming with other hoop sims is the lack of realistic foul distribution. Although the highest fouled/fouling players are often correct, the rate at which a team draws fouls is often incorrect. In Center Court, each team draws fouls based on their actual performance.

Game Contents

Complete rule book, including a detailed description of a partial sample game, useful as a tutorial.

Set of action cards, ready for printing

Score sheet

Foul chart

Team cards, divided by division/conference. Each conference is printed on one separate .pdf file, all organized within division.
